name: Ghost Strike
description: What if ghosts weren't as scary as we thought? In this top-down shooter game, Ghost Strike, you control a sad and innocent ghost and use your own tears to evaporate the Ghost Hunters slowly swarming you, they want to capture you. The Hunters will be randomly attacking you from all directions, and slowly more and more will begin to spawn. You must find out how long you can last in this endless game to achieve the highest score you can. Keep moving, and don't get caught! You only have 3 lives holding your vessel together, so don't lose your spirit and use them wisely!
